#summary Agile user stories for jscep

= Introduction =

See the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User_story user story] article on Wikipedia for more information on user stories.

= Detail =

  * As a user, I want to enrol a certificate in a PKI so that I can interact with other users in the PKI.
  * As a user, I want to renew a certificate in a PKI so that I can continue to interact with other users in the PKI.
